name: Turtle Tale (itch)
description:
Description:

Set in a tropical island in the Philippines, play as a volunteer for the Turtle Conservation Society! Explore the town, talk to the locals, and take on tasks that will save the turtles and the environment. Solve mazes, save turtles, segregate waste, and upgrade island facilities!

Turtle Tale is a short 2D puzzle game which features a navigation maze mechanic that grows broader as the game progresses, a mini-game of plastic sorting that requires the player to arrange plastic products according to their type, and a mini-game of catching wherein the player needs to catch as many plastics as possible.

Features:

  • Main Game. Finish the quests given by the NPCs, or the quest boards, in order to progress. 
  • Mini Game – Sorting. Sort plastics according to type.
  • Mini Game – Save the turtles. Try to catch floating plastics before they choke the turtles.
  • Mini Game – Ecobrick. Create ecobricks by filling soda bottles with discarded and cleaned plastic. These will be later used to build housing for indigenous people.
